title: Different themes for Firefox and Private Browsing?
content: I'd like to use different themes for regular Firefox and Private Browsing mode on the same device. It seems like an easy way to keep track of where you are and what you're doing, but I haven't been able to make it work. Is that possible?
creator: Crunchie

title: Turn off black box hover text
content: This suddenly showed up on my work server. It was not there before. It is very distracting. I researched the internet, but cannot find a solution that actually works. Please help.
creator: Lyghtkeepr

title: Yahoo email not working correctly
content: I have been using Firefox for my Yahoo email for several years. Yesterday afternoon, it stopped working correctly. Only the most recent 10 or so emails are shown in each folder and the rest are greyed out. It no longer allows me to select mail settings and I cannot send emails. My email was still fully functional using Chrome, so I'm not sure the problem involves any changes in the Yahoo site. Has anyone else experienced this, and if so, is there a fix?
creator: parredward

title: Sync not working since had to reinstall Windows
content: In the past, logging in to my Firefox account has caused new installs to just sync with my previous settings, bookmarks etc, but my computer had a... spaz & I had to do a new install of Windows 10, and Firefox will not sync. I've tried hitting 'sync now'...
creator: loosie
